We just wanted to relax (after our team-outing) so we decided to visit Masti Sports Bar (though initially decided to go Sky High, but as most of the things were unavailable @ that time, so we opted for this place.¬†
The place is a bit- smaller in space-wise, but in case of Ambience, food, quality and service/hospitality, its great.. We really had a good time having our relaxation time by sitting there with our colleagues for a normal dinner plus some booze..!¬†
Initially, had a problem in getting table, as its busier on weekends and have lesser space, so after 15 mins, we got the place.¬†
In terms of rest all, it is just good and should be tried out for..!! I really enjoyed our time being here, and really wanted to visit again, with close group as well.
Below are my brief review :
Ambience - 4/5
Food - 4/5
Drink section - 4/5
Pocket friendly - 5/5 (should say, its really pocket-friendly ,as we compare to SkyHigh which is in the same building, though we know they share the same kithen.¬†
Service - 5/5
Staff - 4/5
------------------
Over all - 4/5
In a nutshell, we enjoyed, and look forward to visit again ..! #Kudos.

Having no clue at all . We friends were really bored on a Friday evening . After lot of discussion we decided to go for bowling and a friend had suggested this place instead of the others. When we entered the place it was absolutely empty and after sometime the tables were filled . After a few rounds of bowling we wanted to go to skyhy which is on the very next floor as it was raining the manager said that it's better if we sit here and order food. We ordered chilli cheese toast , corn and spinach cheese filters french fries and few mocktails. The food was really good and made us order more.
